title: Software Testing Quiz
description: Unit testing, TDD, mocking and testing best practices

questions.question: What does TDD stand for?
questions.explanation: TDD stands for Test Driven Development, a methodology where tests are written before the implementation.

questions.question: What is a mock object?
options: A fake object that simulates behavior
questions.explanation: A mock object is a fake object that simulates the behavior of real objects in controlled ways.

questions.question: Unit tests should test multiple components together.
questions.explanation: Unit tests should test individual components in isolation. Testing multiple components together is integration testing.
